data.title: How to use the Apple TV App on your Samsung Smart TV
data.meta_description: With the Apple TV app, you can access your existing library of content, or find new programs to stream. With the Apple Music app, you can stream over 60 million songs and more from you phone, Tab, TV, or Projector.
data.text:
Yes! Many of the titles are available in 4K. When you select a title, just look for the 4K icon to the right of the title's rating.

The Apple TV app is available on Apple TV, Roku, and Amazon streaming devices, as well as the devices listed below. For a full list of compatible devices, check out Apple support. You do not even need to download it because it will appear in the Apps section on your device.

Note: If the Apple TV or Apple Music app does not appear in apps, then it is not compatible with your TV.

Before you can sign into the Apple TV app, you must have an Apple Music or iTunes account. If you have never used Apple Music or iTunes, you need to set up an account in the Apple Music app on your phone or iTunes on your PC.

Before you can sign into the Apple Music app, you must have an Apple ID and an active Apple Music subscription. If you are not a current Apple Music subscriber, you can subscribe directly from the Apple Music app on your Samsung TV or projector.
